blueprint.description: Installs googler (which allows you to Google from the terminal) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [googler](https://github.com/jarun/googler) is a power tool to Google (web, news, videos and site search) from the command-line. It shows the title, URL and abstract for each result, which can be directly opened in a browser from the terminal. Results are fetched in pages (with page navigation). It supports sequential searches in a single googler instance.
blueprint.name: googler
blueprint.title: googler
